website_summaries.verdict: For bodybuilders who suffer through whey supplement shakes, this offers slightly less suffering – in chewy bar form.
pros: Gluten- and soy-free, with whey and milk protein isolates as the source for an impressive 20g of protein
cons: Annoyingly gummy and hard to chew, with a strong aftertaste

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good, Whey protein, No Soy, Low Carb, High Fiber.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the taste of these protein bars. They are very chewy and dense, but not chalky - although you definitely need to drink water with them. The key is that they have whey protein (20g) and no soy, are low carb and low sugar, plus have about 12g of fiber - all with only 190 calories. Very filling with a glass of water. Maybe other reviewers were expecting candy bars?
customer_reviews.author: Mark Determan

customer_reviews.title: horrible tasting!
customer_reviews.text: This bar was by far the worst tasting protein bar I have ever tried. Returned the box after trying one bite that I spit out! I’m not one to return or write negative reviews but this one was worth writing for anyone looking for a decent tasting whey protein bar. DON’T TRY THIS ONE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jule C

customer_reviews.title: Not dry and chalkey like some high protein bars
customer_reviews.text: These bars are so delicious and packed with protein. Not dry and chalkey like some high protein bars. Large chocolate chunks are great! I like the chewy texture and they are just the right "sweetness."
customer_reviews.author: mARY wALKER

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and Satisfying
customer_reviews.text: These are a delicious filling snack! I love the chewy/crunchy texture and the taste. The best part is that these are very satisfying and satiate my hunger for a few hours. I'm so glad I found them on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: T. Jack

customer_reviews.title: I was a bit disappointed when I first opened it expecting it to be ...
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit disappointed when I first opened it expecting it to be white and crisp, but it was rather brown and chewy and not very sweet or as good as I imagined it would be, but the more I ate it the better i liked it, and I like the high protein content. So I would probably buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann

customer_reviews.title: Terrible taste
customer_reviews.text: Flavor is very bland. Texture is like clay. Their protein plus bar is much better but the protein is different.
customer_reviews.author: igs

customer_reviews.title: These bars in all flavors taste good, and have the perfect nutritional balance for me
customer_reviews.text: These bars in all flavors taste good, and have the perfect nutritional balance for me, and the price is very good. I hope I don't jinx this and cause them to be pulled off the shelf or increase in price by writing a positive review. ]
customer_reviews.author: Jerry W. Purvis

customer_reviews.title: just ok
customer_reviews.text: Tried these because I absolutely love the other 4 flavors. These are ok but the taste of alcohol sugars is pretty strong. Don't think I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A.

customer_reviews.title: These bars are great, especially when you subscribe to a monthly delivery
customer_reviews.text: These bars are great, especially when you subscribe to a monthly delivery. CAUTION: make sure you check the expiration date before opening! I've had to return them before because they had already expired.
customer_reviews.author: Judy L. Berdon

customer_reviews.title: i belive you shoud only buy this product if you arr extramly into fitness
customer_reviews.text: This product tested extremely bad. The consistency was terrible. Overall disgusting
customer_reviews.author: iustin Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great low-sugar protein bar
customer_reviews.text: Love them, especially the Cookie Dough flavor. Moist and chewy.
customer_reviews.author: CM2126

customer_reviews.title: The flavor was great and the bar kept me full for hours
customer_reviews.text: The flavor was great and the bar kept me full for hours. The unit cost through Amazon was cheaper than the Markets and the delivery time was only 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make mine Clean Whey by Powerbar!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome meal substitute. The fiber source takes a little getting used to!
customer_reviews.author: Elsa Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little funky flavored but WAY better than the Quest bar.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: I love the bars
customer_reviews.text: I love the bars! But the box I just received was opened and is less than a month from expiring!! Very frustrating! Oh and it was also short 2 bars.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The texture is very chewy- like a taffy- but there is no chemical taste like ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these bars- he said they keep him full for hours so he uses them for breakfast in a rush or when he unexpectedly gets stuck at work late. The texture is very chewy- like a taffy- but there is no chemical taste like many protein bars.
customer_reviews.author: Skkuc

customer_reviews.title: this is one of the worst products I have ever purchased from amazon
customer_reviews.text: I typically do not write reviews. However, this is one of the worst products I have ever purchased from amazon, and by far the worst protein bar I have ever had. It taste like nail polish remover. I can power through some less than favorable flavors, but the pungent acetone flavor is whey too much(get it, Whey, too much :) . Furthermore it is so thick and sticky I may as well be chewing on a sneaker. I hope this review assist you in avoiding this product. Go with "MusclePharm Combat Crunch" they are delicious.
customer_reviews.author: nic guyer

customer_reviews.title: Go Go Godzilla--Yuck
customer_reviews.text: Disgusting. They taste like chemicals. The sweetener they use is overpowering and tastes like medicine. I returned mine immediately. If Godzilla dropped a #2 and you decided to take a bite--just out of curiosity--this is exactly what you'd be eating. I cannot believe how bad these are. They must be bad for you as well.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Castle

customer_reviews.title: Give me terrible gas (flatulence)
customer_reviews.text: These things give me terrible gas each time I've eaten one. About 5-6 hours after I eat one they make me start farting. I'm pretty sure it's the ingredient "inulin" that they contain, as I've experienced gas from another product that contained inulin as well. They taste pretty good (they're so sweet it's basically like eating a candy bar), but I won't be buying any more and will be tossing the remaining bars in the trash as of today.
customer_reviews.author: Jack  B. Nimble

customer_reviews.title: Great taste with low sugar
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised by the reviews which complain about the taste. I've recently been put on a reduced sugar diet, and I'm amazed at how good these are, with only a few grams of sugar. Somehow they satisfy my craving for sweets - in fact I save them for dessert! They are very rich, so I eat only a half bar at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They're protein, not candy
customer_reviews.text: Glad I finally found a source for these. Love 'em! Beats carrying liquid or cottage cheese in your purse. I suppose an acquired taste if you are used to sweet-sweet protein sources.
customer_reviews.author: Knobby Wheezer

customer_reviews.title: No Cookie Dough
customer_reviews.text: Tasted like unflavored plastic, not chocolate chip cookie dough, texture and taste were not good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yucky taste
customer_reviews.text: These had a bad after taste... like metal... this is not the sellers fault.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Cecce

customer_reviews.title: Bert quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice clean and yummy. Too yummy. Best quality protein bar
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: ... little chewy but fills you up and is a great meal
customer_reviews.text: A little chewy but fills you up and is a great meal replacement
customer_reviews.author: M. Haider

customer_reviews.title: Not that good
customer_reviews.text: These are like eating a piece of taffy except they don’t taste as good. They’re tough and rubbery.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good protein bars, box already opened and two bars removed when received.
customer_reviews.author: Mokey

customer_reviews.title: Taste good, weird texture(maybe due to freezing during shipment)
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the texture was more like a Laffy Taffy bar than a protein bar. Maybe a symptom of having it shipped to me in the middle of winter? I'm not sure. They tasted great(for protein bars), but the texture was enough to keep me from eating more of them. I may try ordering when its warmer out to see if the freezing temps are what messed up the texture.
customer_reviews.author: ChickenDinner

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Reminiscent of the traditional powerbars in terms of texture, but not as sweet, as one would expect. I was really disappointed... the flavor is not bad, it's just not worth the price. Very bland texture... bar is very sticky to the wrapper. I'm looking for a Quest replacement (because unfortunately they've gone way downhill in their quality, despite the really good taste and texture), and this is not it, unfortunately. The PowerBar Protein Plus bar is much better... I wish they would make a version of that without soy ;-(
customer_reviews.author: flapjack

customer_reviews.title: I tried to be objective and give them a good try, but they taste so bad that after ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried to be objective and give them a good try, but they taste so bad that after 1.5 bars I could not eat them anymore. Bad flavor, very sticky and tough to eat without washing your hands ofter. Offered them up at work to some of the cross fit folks in the office, but after a week I just threw them away.
customer_reviews.author: Bikeboy540

customer_reviews.title: Not a healthy product contains palm kernel oil and canola ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a healthy product contains palm kernel oil and canola oil along with soluable corn fiber and erythritol, an alcohol sugar. 3 grams saturated fat.
customer_reviews.author: buckmaster

customer_reviews.title: I thought both had a chewy texture that tasted both sweet yet satisfying
customer_reviews.text: I tried both the chocolate chip cookie dough and cookies and cream flavors. I thought both had a chewy texture that tasted both sweet yet satisfying. I felt full afterwards and definitely was not hungry again for several hours. This was a great pick me up snack especially in the late afternoon when I am craving something sweet to tide me over until dinner time. I would definitely purchase these bars again as I like that they did not leave any unpleasant aftertaste after consuming them. Disclosure: I received both the chocolate chip cookie dough and cookies and cream bars as a free sample in return for my honest review. All opinions expressed here are solely my own.
customer_reviews.author: Glori A. Mauro

customer_reviews.title: Good Tasting Protein Bars
customer_reviews.text: These bars taste great! I love that they are soft and chewy and have a great flavor. They make a great meal or high protein snack and fill you up to keep you going through the day. I like that they are made with good nutritious ingredients and aren't too many calories. The flavors taste natural and not too sweet or artificial. I recommend these for an energy boost through the day and a good for you snack.
customer_reviews.author: stef42678

customer_reviews.title: Awful, awful, awful
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible. I cannot get the whey taste out of my mouth. I am normally a fan of the sweet, sticky Powerbars. When eaten with water, they dissolve right down to a readily usable energy source. That being said, the taste of these bars, especially the raspberry vanilla, is surprising in it's awfulness and definitely not worth the up to $2.00 I paid for per bar. I did call the manufacturer. They are very sorry for my experience but you know, go suck it, right?
customer_reviews.author: Guido Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this rating a 0 I would. This most definitely does not taste like a protein bar. It has the taste of chewing gum as your chewing it. I kept looking at it to assure that this was an actual protein bar. Even though I did not want to I did finish this product but it makes me feel horrible. I have a very upset stomach since I've eaten it about 4 to 5 hours ago. Please don't purchase. If it makes you feel like crap
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nasty
customer_reviews.text: I typically like PowerBar because of the high protein and they can be used as meal replacements. I was excited about a protein bar being made of just whey protein. I tried one bar out this pack because that was all I could stomach. The flavor was unrecognizable. I just know it tasted like some form of nasty. I would not recommend given this bar to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Lattimore

customer_reviews.title: I liked the chewy texture and thought the sweetness was just ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried the chocolate chip cookie dough in addition to the cookies and cream flavors. I liked the chewy texture and thought the sweetness was just right. This was a good mid morning or afternoon snack. I would purchase these bars on my own. They were better than I expected them to be, especially when I first looked at them.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Stolen flavor Tastes like Play Dough
customer_reviews.text: These taste not vaguely like play dough. The texture is awful, the flavor is non-existent. The smell is also unattractive. Worse yet, they gave this flavor to this new "clean whey," product at the expense of this flavor in the original product. I gave these a fair shot, and these are simply inedible.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Taffy texture
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY wanted to like these bars but the texture just kills me. It honestly looks and tastes like the texture of laffy taffy. I even bit into it and it stretched like taffy before it broke away. BLEGH. It doesn't really taste like much of anything either.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but come with a high cost in price
customer_reviews.text: They are good but I dont think they are worth the high price. I bought some at the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell P.

customer_reviews.title: Strange flavor
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this product to one of the people who gave it high ratings. I took one bite and thought l was going to be sick. The flavor is strange and it is difficult to chew. I am a big fan of the Protein Plus Power Bar and will stay with it.
customer_reviews.author: virginia littlefield

customer_reviews.title: Tastes terrible
customer_reviews.text: The macros look pretty good (a lot like Quest), but Quest tastes 1 million times better. I don't know why I keep trying to find things similar to Quest. From now on I'm just going to buy Quest. They figured out how to make high protein bars taste amazing. Period.
customer_reviews.author: Joe May

customer_reviews.title: the best
customer_reviews.text: i have tried many of protein bars and this is the best with all the flavors and i keep buying from them and will continue buying thanks power bar .
customer_reviews.author: Nada

customer_reviews.title: Are these discontinued?
customer_reviews.text: Are these discontinued? They have been unavailable for awhile. They were a nice treat and low carb, so I hope not. ; (
customer_reviews.author: Lana Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: The best way I can express what these taste like is ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awful. The best way I can express what these taste like is to relay something from many years ago in emergency medical services. Before HIV and other lovely things, CPR was really mouth to mouth with no mask until you got going with airway management or had an Ambu Bag. With less than perfect technique, or even with it, there were and are occasions where the patient will vomit. And with no mask, you know where that is going. This repugnant thing, reminds me of those days. Sorry for any of you with weak stomachs, but I trust I have clearly communicated the revolting nature of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Truly disheartening
customer_reviews.text: Texture of 1970's play dough. This recipe needs to be updated for those of us with normal tastebuds in 2019.
customer_reviews.author: A Keck

customer_reviews.title: Bad aftertaste!
customer_reviews.text: Had a brutal, lingering aftertaste I couldn't shake for hours.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: Don't like the taste? Then go eat a candy bar
customer_reviews.text: Just so everybody is on the same page, the reason why other protein bars taste "good" is because they are full of sugar. Take a look sometime at the nutrition label for those tasty bars and you'll as shocked as I was. All I wanted was a convenient form of protein that I could consume on the go, or at home when I am not in the mood to make a whey protein shake, and this does the job. I'm not looking for a tasty snack, that's not what this is supposed to be. This is a nutrition supplement intended for those pursuing a health lifestyle and this product hits it out of the park.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous67

customer_reviews.title: Like fruit stripe gum
customer_reviews.text: Someone left these on the counter at work. I knew they'd be awful, but hunger + curiosity + free. I was pleasantly surprised at the flavor, at the beginning. Then I kept chewing, and chewing, and chewing, and chewing, and chewing. The flavor goes away, but the consistency never changed into something I could swallow. Once the flavor goes away they taste pretty bad, so I spat it out and threw the rest away. Based on other reviews, it looks like you have to drink water while chewing in order to dissolve the stuff.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Far Beyond Awful!
customer_reviews.text: Do your wallet AND your rectum a favor, and AVOID these bars. In addition to tasting terrible, the gastrointestinal side effects were worse than any bar I have ever used. Hopefully these things get discontinued soon! I would give these less than one star if I could!
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: One of better bars out there
customer_reviews.text: These bars do the job. Make you feel full. Have the right amount of nutrition. Right amount of sweetness. One of the better bars I've had. They simply fill you up. Doesn't crumble everywhere. Nutrition bars aren't meant to taste like a snickers bar. Other bars don't give you the full feeling. This is an overall great bar!
customer_reviews.author: Octavio V. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Taste and healthy--if not sweet--protein bar
customer_reviews.text: PowerBar's Whey Protein bars are quite similar in consistency to Quest's protein bars --like melted butter; you can easily tear or bite off a piece of the bar. Although the low amount of net carbs (4g for the chocolate chip cookie dough variety), high fiber (around 13g per bar - wow!), and low sugar (only 2g, much lower than General Mills' Fiber One bars) are very appealing, these bars are far from being sweet enough. While the chips themselves are similar in taste to chocolate chips used for baking (i.e. bitter-sweet), the rest of the bar is not. The overall taste is good, but PowerBar could really improve the taste of the bar if they added a little more sweetener.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Not as great.
customer_reviews.text: When I first heard about these I immediately thought with my eyes instead of my brain. The pictures of the cookies and cream bar looks delicious. So after a workout I went to the store and decided to try one. Boy was I wrong. The taste was very and I mean very artificial it tasted almost like sweetener. The cookies inside of it tasted stale. The only thing good was the chocolate. The macros are hugely similar to the quest bar. Honestly I regretted not getting it instead but hey at least I know now.
customer_reviews.author: miguel gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate chip cookie dough
customer_reviews.text: Tried the chocolate chip cookie dough and cookies and cream. The cookies and cream was too sweet. Want to try the white fudge raspberry next. All are gluten and soy free. Like the fact that it gives me energy with more whey and less sugar. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Helene Weissberg

customer_reviews.title: Great-tasting and nutritious!
customer_reviews.text: I tried the Cookies & Cream and the Cookie Dough flavors of this bar and thought both were tasty and satisfying. My only real complaint is the texture as it was really sticky and had a hard time coming off the wrapper (I found that if you put them in the refrigerator they open more easily but cancels out the convenience factor). All in all, a great tasting protein bar with all the right numbers on the label, but still not my absolute favorite on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Fontenot

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great tasting
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first about a protein bar, I have never tried it before and assumed it would be weird. But when I received this as a sample boy was I surprised! It tasted GREAT, and even my child loved it and begged for more. It definitely is a different texture than your average "bar," a little more chewy I think, but the taste is great. I would highly recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Sfmama

customer_reviews.title: Protein Bars
customer_reviews.text: I tried both the chocolate chip cookie dough and the cookies and cream. I'll start with the pros. I love that these are low sugar, soy free, gluten free, and less than 200 calories! And there are no artificial flavors, colors or sweeteners. Those are all things I look for. The cons for these are that the texture was similar to laffy taffy candy. I also couldn't distinguish a real difference between the two flavors.
customer_reviews.author: j.rey2477

customer_reviews.title: Horrible taste!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, HORRIBLE taste!! On top of the taste they are very chewy. Could not even finish the first bar and I bought the whole box (at a local store). Throwing these away. Do not waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Avy

customer_reviews.title: Not cakelike but chewy like a soft tootsie roll which is a plus in ...
customer_reviews.text: Cookie Dough - yummy, less than 190 calories w/20g protein. Not cakelike but chewy like a soft tootsie roll which is a plus in my book since I scarf down food usually. Also, 5 pts on WeightWatcher SmartPoints program! No aftertaste on this flavor but the did find an aftertaste on the Cookies & cream. A little pricey but it's competitive with other bars in this class. If you found my review helpful, please click yes below.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.C.

customer_reviews.title: Meh.....
customer_reviews.text: I'm weird that I like that sticky, gooey consistency of Powerbars, which this definitely has- but it has very little flavor. And what flavor there is, it's almost plasticy to me. I suppose if I was starving and needed a bunch of protein with low carbs and sugar this would work, but...wouldn't be my first choice.
customer_reviews.author: Juice's review

customer_reviews.title: Gave me bad stomach ache
customer_reviews.text: Super delicious + filling! If you have any type of stomach issues, I would stay away from this one. This wrecked my stomach ALL day and I know I can’t eat it again :(
customer_reviews.author: Summer V. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Not good at all!
customer_reviews.text: Its very bland, dry, not sweet at all and basically taste almost like nothing. Theres pieces of chocolate in it that for whatever reason add no texture or even a chocolate taste. Its like a very bland, poor attempt at the cookie dough quest bar. I would not recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: faithdeanlove

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting
customer_reviews.text: These bars taste fantastic but, so do all the other protein bars out there. My only complaint is the packaging, it is real stuck to the product and kind of a pain to open. Other than that if you are into the protein bar craze you wont go wrong purchasing these.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth N. Hebert

product_meta.title: PowerBar Clean Whey Bar, Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough, 2.12 oz Bar, (16 Count)
product_meta.description:
PowerBar Clean Whey Bars are made with 20g of high quality protein, 2g sugar and 5g net carbs or less. They are made with a combination of whey isolate, which is fast acting to quickly repair muscles, and milk protein, which aids in long lasting energy and helps you feel fuller longer. They are crafted with no artificial sweeteners, flavors, or colors and no added sugar and are gluten free!
Available in 5 delicous flavors: White Fudge Raspberry, Cookies and Cream, Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough, Chocolate Nut Brownie and Vanilla Coconut Crunch.
feature_bullets: Each bar contains 20g protein, 5g net carbs*, 2g sugar, 13g fiber, 20% DV Calcium. *Net Carbs = Total Carbohydrates - Dietary Fiber - Sugar Alcohols

Each bar is packed with high quality whey and milk protein isolates and is a good source of fiber and calcium. Enjoy the convenience of these grab and go bars to help replenish muscles and recover with ease post-workout or as a snack any time of day
Deliciously chewy bar available in 5 scrumptious flavors: White Fudge Raspberry, Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough, Cookies and Cream, Vanilla Coconut Crunch, Chocolate Nut Brownie
NO ARTIFICIAL Flavors, Colors or Sweeteners, NO added sugar, NO SOY ingredients, GLUTEN FREE

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
